column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Last night , I went into the bathroom to take a bath like I do every night .
#text=I turned on the water and adjusted it to get just the right temperature , then put in the drain plug .
#text=I got a towel out of the pantry and set it on the counter for afterwards .
#text=When the tub was mostly full , I removed my garments and got in .
#text=I soaped up a washcloth and scrubbed every part of my body , then I got the shampoo , squeezed a little in my hand , and rubbed it into my hair .
#text=After thoroughly scrubbing my head , I dunked it underwater to rinse it out .
#text=When I was all clean , I pulled the drain plug out and stepped out of the tub .
#text=I grabbed the towel and dabbed myself off .
